item.title: Raggedy Ann Stories
item.description: Well those are wonderful. It’s Toy Story nearly a century before Toy Story (I wonder just how old ’toys come alive’ stories are?), with a doll and her friends waking up and getting into all sorts of delightfully weird and cute trouble. Story by story. Raggedy Ann Learns a Lesson Raggedy Ann and the Kite Raggedy Ann Rescues Fido Raggedy Ann and the Strange Dolls Raggedy Ann and the Kittens Raggedy Ann and the Chickens Raggedy Ann’s New Sister Raggedy Ann Learns a Lesson And so itâ€™s Toy Story!
